channel.title: BuddyTV
channel.description: BuddyTV - TV News, Spoilers, Pictures, Profiles, Forums, and Live Commentary

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Week 2 Results Prediction: Vanderpump Does Not Rule
item.description:
For the first time on season 16 of Dancing with the Stars a contestant is being sent home. On Monday night's episode there were some good performances, bad performances and ugly performances. Will the worst dancing team get eliminated tonight on "Prom Night?"

Unfortunately you never know who the fans will vote for. If tonight's Dancing with the Stars results show was based on performance we would already know who lost (D.L. Hughley), but a big part of the show is a pair's likeability.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Following' Recap: Love and Betrayal on 'Guilt'
item.description: On The Following, Joe had one goal: finding Claire and reuniting their family. On "Guilt," despite the efforts of the FBI and Ryan Hardy, Claire willingly gave herself up to Joe's Followers in order to be reunited with her son, but only after she and Ryan declared their love for each other.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Revolution' Recap: Charlie Loses Another Loved One
item.description: Four months after the mid-season finale, Revolution returns for the rest of its intriguing first season with tonight's spring premiere. In tonight's eleventh episode, "The Stand," Monroe's reign of terror reaches new heights thanks to his newly-powered weapons. Can Team Charlie stop Monroe before it's too late? Read on to find out if the mid-season opener lives up to expectations.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Bates Motel' Recap: Norma's First Son Threatens to Ruin Everything
item.description: Norma's eldest son arrives in White Pine Bay. The police question Norma about the disappearance of the motel's previous owner. A mysterious accident proves the picturesque town has an ugly side. Norma becomes closer to one of the town's residents. Let's jump into this episode of Bates Motel.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Castle' Recap: Ryan's Surprising Past Uncovered
item.description: This week on Castle, we take a step away from our main players to spend some time learning about Detective Ryan. And man, has Ryan been holding out on us! Our favorite mild-mannered snappy dresser has a past with the Irish mob. It turns out if you take Ryan out of his signature three-piece suit, he has the capacity to be a pretty dangerous dude.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Voice' Season 4 Premiere Recap: Ushering in a New Shak-year-a
item.description: Welcome back, fans of spinning chairs, people who point at themselves and Carson Daly! It's The Voice season 4, and I'm very happy to return for another year of recapping the best singing show on TV. Sorry American Idol, but if you think Lazaro Arbos is one of the eight best singers in the country, we've got a problem.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Finale Recap: Bickering, Breakups and Renewed Vows
item.description: On the season 3 finale of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Faye fights with Lisa, Brandi fights with Faye, Kyle fights with Kim and Yolanda fights with Faye. Adrienne shows up to cry, and Lisa and Ken renew their wedding vows.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Bones' Recap: What If 'Bones' Was a Documentary?
item.description: When a documentarian visits Brennan and the gang in "The Blood from the Stones" to shoot a film as they work through the latest case in order to raise money for the Jeffersonian, it brings out everyone's slightly ridiculous side. And although I'm never as excited about the case as I am with the side storylines in an episode, this Bones episode really brought it.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Recap: A Second Chance to Escape Elimination
item.description:
One of the nicest things about Dancing with the Stars is how pleasant everyone is to each other: while plucked-from-obscurity talent competitions typically invite brutal, often personal criticism, everyone on Dancing with the Stars is treated with respect and courtesy on account of their celebrity status -- that won't stop me from calling D.L. Hughley's Cha-Cha-Cha the most cringe-worthy two minutes I've ever seen on the show, but I do appreciate that the judges and hosts are at least a bit more tactful.

ABC Announces Season Finale Dates for Spring 2013 >>>

It's in that spirit of friendliness that we enter the second week, as every single contestant is given a second chance to prove their merit. The best can showcase their talents, and the worst can try to do better before tomorrow's elimination.

Our live blog starts now:
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Arrow' Episode 19 Photos: The Count Returns
item.description: Official photos from the April 3 episode.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: TBS Renews 'Cougar Town' for Season 5
item.description: Uncork the wine, Cougar Town fans, because the show is staying alive. Today TBS officially renewed the Courteney Cox drama for season 5, to consist of 13 episodes premiering in 2014.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 10 Late Night Guests to Watch: Usher, Andy Dick, Keith Urban and More
item.description:
This is an exciting time for late night fans with all the Tonight Show rumors. When will Jimmy Fallon take over for Jay Leno? Will the Tonight Show move back to New York? Who will take over for Late Night? Will Leno move to FOX and start a whole new late night show? Rumors usually will prompt late night hosts to start poking fun at each other, so the guests will just be a bonus this week. With that said, there are still some very good guests.

Download the BuddyTV Guide app to get all the latest information on TV?s biggest stars!
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: Oedipus Wrecks: TV?s Most Messed-Up Mother/Son Relationships
item.description: The Oedipus Complex, in which a man subconsciously wants to sleep with his mother and kill his father, is no stranger to TV. There are plenty of smothering mothers whose relationships with their sons are a little too close for comfort. Here are the top 10 examples of moms and sons who cross the line.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Revolution' Spring Premiere Preview: Monroe Attacks the Rebels on 'The Stand'
item.description: Four months ago, Revolution left viewers wondering what would happen to Miles and his group after rescuing Danny, finding Rachel alive, and escaping from Monroe only to find a helicopter with high-powered guns looming overhead. The wait ends tonight with Revolution's spring premiere, "The Stand." From the first minute to the last, it's non-stop suspense and action with many heartfelt moments interspersed.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Castle' Episode 5.18 Preview: Ryan Takes Things into His Own Hands
item.description: Castle season 5 continues on Monday, March 25 with an episode called "The Wild Rover." Check out the episode synopsis and preview video below and see what happens when Ryan has to go back undercover using an old alias to help solve a case.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Bones' Episode 8.20 Preview: Shopping for Engagement Rings or Solving a Murder?
item.description: Bones season 8 continues on Monday, March 25 with an episode called "The Blood from the Stones." Check out the synopsis and preview video below to find out what happens when Booth and Brennan walk into a diamond ring store while on a case.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Nashville' Exclusive Interview: Showrunner Dee Johnson Talks Love Triangles and Rayna's Big Secret
item.description: Nashville returns from hiatus this week with an episode called "When You're Tired of Breaking Other Hearts." BuddyTV spoke to showrunner Dee Johnson at this month's Paleyfest event about what fans can expect to see in the rest of the season.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Walking Dead': 24 Heart-Pounding Moments from 'This Sorrowful Life'
item.description:
The Walking Dead takes place during a dangerous time with threats from both the living and the dead. In "This Sorrowful Life" decisions were made that cost lives, while proving that both humanity still exists and redemption is always possible.

Check out the heart-pounding moments from "This Sorrowful Life." Some were full of hope for the future, while others were dangerous or dreadful.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Psych' 100th Episode Celebration and Set Photos
item.description:
Psych is celebrating their 100th episode this week with the highly anticipated "Clue." On May 31st, 2012, the Psych cast and crew celebrated achieving their 100th episode.

Check out photos taken during the Psych cast and crew celebration, as well as, photos taken of the Psych Santa Barbara Police Department set.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: Buddy Battles Semifinals: Ryan and Esposito vs. Brennan and Angela!
item.description: The Buddy Battles have been raging hard all March and we're coming down to the wire! Soon we'll be crowning your favorite dynamic duo, but first there's another pair ready to battle it out in the semifinal round.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Following' Video Sneak Peeks: Claire's in Danger on 'Guilt'
item.description: On The Following, Joe's Followers have failed twice to capture Claire, will they succeed on their third attempt? Or, will Ryan and the FBI be able to protect her? It's all going to come down to timing. Meanwhile, Joe uses his incredible manipulation skills to get closer to his son, Joey. FOX has released four sneak peeks and a preview video for "Guilt." Check them out!
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Psych' Interview: Timothy Omundson and Maggie Lawson Tease 100th Episode, Musical Episode and More
item.description: USA's hit series, Psych, celebrates its 100th episode on Wednesday March 27 with a special episode called "100 Clues." BuddyTV was on the line when stars Timothy Omundson and Maggie Lawson sat down to talk about what it was like to film the 100th episode, and give details on what fans can expect from the rest of Psych season 7.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Week 2 Preview: Time to Jazz It Up
item.description: Fans got their first look at the season 16 cast of Dancing with the Stars in action last week. While none of the contestants blew the judges away, a number of the celebrity dancers put forth strong first showings.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Kardashians' Roundup: Kim Shares Acupuncture Photo, Talks Weight Gain and Baby Names
item.description: After admitting that her pregnancy is not all sunshine and roses, Kim Kardashian appears to be looking for ways to de-stress. Her idea of relaxation, however, is quite different from what you would expect.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Revenge' Winners and Losers from 'Victory'
item.description: Not everyone can be a winner on Revenge and this week was no exception. Check out the winners and losers from "Victory." The red marker did make a return!
item.author: editor@buddytv.com
